/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the image. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their silhouettes faint against the bright sky. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of blue, green, and brown, creating a harmonious and serene atmosphere.
